RE sierra pacificHere is everything that you requested The Sierra Pacific chart is in the PGE document As far as the origination diagrams I redid the physical chart but for the paper chart I need for you to look it over and I will make the necessary corrections Have a great weekend Mara Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Friday August PM To Bronstein Mara Subject sierra pacific mara send me via email the sierra pacific charts and also the flow charts on booking deals bt

FW Powerpoint file Cc Attached is the powerpoint slide that Barry would like everyone to use for their Denver presentations This way everything will be standardized and it will make it easier for me to put all of the slides into a booklet Thanks Mara Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Monday August PM To Bronstein Mara Subject Powerpoint file mara attached is a slidemaster that you can use BT
Presentationppt Cc Here is a new copy of the El Paso capacity sheets that we went over today in the meeting Please fill in anything that you can and send it back to me Thanks Mara
Kern River GenerationxlsHere is the generation information If you need more detail just tell me

Citizens October Cc houston Darla Here is the spreadsheet for CitizensPPL Griffith for October I dont think that the pipe rates have changed for the month but if they have can you just change my numbers at the top of the sheet I would really appreciate it If you have any questions call me Thanks Mara

RE Citizens Cc houston Here is the Citizens sheet for September Sorry so late Thanks Mara Bronstein Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Monday October AM To Bronstein Mara Subject FW Citizens Darla is ready to bill citizens for Sept I guess we can use Cogans sheet if we are comfortable it is correct Let me know if you need anything and when you think we can get this to Darla Thanks Kim Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Sunday October PM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject RE Citizens Hi Kim I am ready to invoice Citizens for September Do you have the Griffith sheet ready yet Thanks Darla Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday October AM To Saucier Darla Subject RE Citizens I am back in the office we are having a conference call this afternoon to iron out the last calculation questions and you will get a final spreadsheet for August and September from Mara Bronstein I have not talked to Sarabeth as you have the only copy of the invoice that I had Have you talked to Bryce about that invoice What do you guys need in order to pay them Thanks Kim Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Tuesday October PM To Bike Anne Cc Ward Kim S Houston Subject Citizens Hi Just wanted to get an update from you on the Citizens info I asked you about last week I am wondering about the payment to John Cogan for Aug production and the EAMR payment due Did you talk to Sarabeth about that Thanks Darla

Palo Alto InvoiceSept xlsI will give you a copy of Anns sheet You can look at my spreadsheet and make sure I included everything and see what you think Thanks Mara
ConexantxlsIf you would rather me just print this out for you I will Tell me if you need anything else

Palo Alto InvoiceAug xlsKim Here is the August spreadsheet These are the changes Ive made so far I changed the formula in column R I added in the new contracts for August The differences between my model and the invoice are the way that they calculate the actual gas flow to Malin column L on mine and column Z on theirs It also appears that they do not include the Redwood credit Looking at my model now I also dont remember what the calculation in column D is for It seems kind of unnecessary to me and doesnt make much sense I know this is a lot of stuff to look at If you dont understand what I just wrote ask me and Ill explain what Im trying to say Thanks Mara

RE Citizens Cc houston Here is the Citizens sheet for September Sorry so late Thanks Mara Bronstein Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Monday October AM To Bronstein Mara Subject FW Citizens Darla is ready to bill citizens for Sept I guess we can use Cogans sheet if we are comfortable it is correct Let me know if you need anything and when you think we can get this to Darla Thanks Kim Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Sunday October PM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject RE Citizens Hi Kim I am ready to invoice Citizens for September Do you have the Griffith sheet ready yet Thanks Darla Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday October AM To Saucier Darla Subject RE Citizens I am back in the office we are having a conference call this afternoon to iron out the last calculation questions and you will get a final spreadsheet for August and September from Mara Bronstein I have not talked to Sarabeth as you have the only copy of the invoice that I had Have you talked to Bryce about that invoice What do you guys need in order to pay them Thanks Kim Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Tuesday October PM To Bike Anne Cc Ward Kim S Houston Subject Citizens Hi Just wanted to get an update from you on the Citizens info I asked you about last week I am wondering about the payment to John Cogan for Aug production and the EAMR payment due Did you talk to Sarabeth about that Thanks Darla

Palo Alto InvoiceAug xlsKim Here is the August spreadsheet These are the changes Ive made so far I changed the formula in column R I added in the new contracts for August The differences between my model and the invoice are the way that they calculate the actual gas flow to Malin column L on mine and column Z on theirs It also appears that they do not include the Redwood credit Looking at my model now I also dont remember what the calculation in column D is for It seems kind of unnecessary to me and doesnt make much sense I know this is a lot of stuff to look at If you dont understand what I just wrote ask me and Ill explain what Im trying to say Thanks Mara

RE Fundamentals Welcome MaraSorry It was in yesterdays Gas Daily on page Mara Original Message From Dasovich Jeff Sent Thursday October AM To Bronstein Mara Subject RE Fundamentals Welcome Mara Didnt work Was it in yesterdays gas daily If so I can access it Thanks very much for your help Best Jeff Original Message From Bronstein Mara Sent Thu AM To Dasovich Jeff Cc Subject Fundamentals Welcome Mara Fundamentals Welcome Marahtm Barry asked me to send you this article about DWR in yesterdays Gas Daily The article is on page I am not sure if this will work if it doesnt email me back and I will send the article a different way Thanks Mara Bronstein
